name: series_get_venues
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cricbuzz_cricket.
Tool description: This API helps to query for live cricket scores, commentary, latest cricket news and editorials, schedules of upcoming matches, rankings, stats, records, etc
API description: Fetches the venues for a given cricket series using the Series ID.

seriesid.description: The unique identifier for the series, obtainable from the `/series/list` or `/series/list-archives` endpoints.
